episode.title: DevSpeak #27 | Application of MVC and CA architectures in practice
episode.members: Diego Fernandes, Dani Leão, Otávio Lemos and Rodrigo Branas
episode.description:
Diego Fernandes and Daniele Evangelista hosted Otávio Lemos and Rodrigo Branas to chat about modern development architectures, applied in the tech industry.

What are the fundamentals, principles and importance of discussing architectures in this ecosystem?

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we bring together tech professionals to discuss everything circulating in the programming orbit.

DevSpeak is a Rocketseat original podcast.  Factsheet Hosts: Diego Fernandes and Daniele Leão Evangelista Guests: Otávio Lemos and Rodrigo Branas Script: Felipe Buzzi, Beatriz Clasen and Thiago Marinho Editing: Thiago Santana Production: Leonardo Minatti

Audio in Brazilian Portuguese.
